events.title: New Years Eve
events.description: Enjoy a night of dancing, champagne, and hot and cold hors d'oeuvres while the new year comes around!

events.title: Valentine's Dance
events.description: Celebrate love with an evening of romantic ballroom dancing and refreshments!

events.title: Spring Gala
events.description: Welcome spring with elegant dancing, live music, and delicious appetizers!
